pagetriage-add-a-note-creator-required: Paale toɔla ko a maalmaala, {{GENDER:$1|$1}}. Te na toɔle a toɔla ŋa ka o gaa a dɛmmo yelyeluu gampɛlɛ ka o danseɛ di o meŋaŋ.
pagetriage-add-a-note-previous-reviewer: Paale toɔla ko a puoriŋ leɛkaara, {{GENDER:$1|$1}}. Te na toɔle a toɔla ŋa meŋ ka o gaa a dɛmmo yelyeluu gampɛlɛ ka o danseɛ di o meŋaŋ .
pagetriage-personal-default-note: Sɛge sɛgere naŋ taa sommo ko {{GENDER:$1|$1}}. Te na toɔle o la ka o gaa{{GENDER:$1|o|o|ba}} yelyeluu gampɛlɛ ka o danseɛ di o meŋaŋ .
